div.p: BR and JAV conceived the entire study. DEL implemented the genomics bioinformatics. JAV, PGP, MM, DGA, GPMD contributed to the sample collection. BR, WEJ, GPMD, JAV analyzed and interpreted the genetic data. MDM conceived the acquisition of data, analysis and interpretation of spatial environmental data from remote sensing and GIS databases. All authors were involved in drafting or revising the content of the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
